BundleInfo.name: ChimeraX-ProteinCraft
BundleInfo.Author: ProteinCraft
BundleInfo.Description:
ProteinCraft tools for ChimeraX.
Implements commands "proteincraft status" to check the status of ProteinCraft, and "proteincraft sync" to synchronize with ProteinCraft.

Classifiers.ChimeraXClassifier: ChimeraX :: Command :: proteincraft status :: General :: Display ProteinCraft status
ChimeraX :: Command :: proteincraft sync :: General :: Synchronize with ProteinCraft using JSON
ChimeraX :: Command :: proteincraft sync_bonds :: General :: Synchronize bonds with ProteinCraft
ChimeraX :: Command :: proteincraft printJson :: General :: Print the stored JSON string from ProteinCraft
ChimeraX :: Command :: proteincraft bondDetail :: General :: Show or set bond detail type (CA/ATOM/AUTO)
ChimeraX :: Command :: proteincraft flankingNum :: General :: Show or set number of flanking residues to highlight
ChimeraX :: Command :: proteincraft flankingEnabled :: General :: Show or set whether flanking residues should be displayed
ChimeraX :: Command :: proteincraft flankingTransparency :: General :: Show or set transparency value for non-highlighted regions (0-100)
